definition: Giacomo Casanova (1725-1798), Italian adventurer known for womanizing
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: How do I know you're really Casanova ?
sentences.chinese: 我怎麼知道你真是卡薩諾瓦？

sentences.english: So what did Casanova do that night?
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上卡薩諾瓦做了什麼？

sentences.english: I don't know. What would Casanova do?
sentences.chinese: 我不知道，卡薩諾瓦會怎麼做？

sentences.english: Giacomo Casanova himself was said to court maidens in the gardens around the Cipriani spa.
sentences.chinese: 據說，“情聖”卡薩諾瓦在花園裏曾向姑娘們求過愛。

sentences.english: Where can I watch Casanova Brown movie online free full stream?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪裏可以看電影卡薩諾瓦布朗網上免費全速？

sentences.english: Is this the palazzo of Signor Casanova?
sentences.chinese: 這是卡薩諾瓦的宅邸嗎？
